import HeroSection from '@/components/HeroSection';
import Experience from '@/components/Experience';
import Skills from '@/components/Skills';
import Projects from '@/components/Projects';
import PassionProjects from '@/components/PassionProjects';

      <HeroSection />
      <Experience />
      <Skills />
      <Projects />
      <PassionProjects />
      <EducationCertifications />
      <Contact />

<result>
# Portfolio Website - Developer Guide

## Overview
Personal portfolio website for David Fotescu, a Software Architect and AI/ML Solutions Architect. Built with Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

## Key Commands
- `npm run dev` - Development server (http://localhost:3000)
- `npm run build` - Production build
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint

## Project Structure
```
src/
├── app/
│   ├── layout.tsx      # Root layout with metadata, dark theme
│   └── page.tsx        # Main page composing all sections
├── components/
│   ├── Header.tsx      # Navigation with scroll behavior
│   ├── HeroSection.tsx # Animated intro with TypeScript effect
│   ├── Experience.tsx  # Work history timeline
│   ├── Skills.tsx      # Technical skills grid
│   ├── Projects.tsx    # Featured projects showcase
│   ├── PassionProjects.tsx # Personal/hobby projects
│   ├── EducationCertifications.tsx
│   ├── Contact.tsx     # Contact form section
│   └── Footer.tsx      # Site footer
└── styles/
    └── globals.css     # Global styles, Tailwind config
```

## Architecture Guidelines
- **Component Pattern**: Functional components with TypeScript, animations via Framer Motion
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with dark theme (zinc/neutral palette), accent colors for branding
- **Icons**: Lucide React for consistent iconography
- **Animations**: Framer Motion for scroll-triggered and interactive animations
- **Typography**: Inter font (variable)

## Conventions
- Use semantic HTML sections with clear id attributes for navigation
- Animations should be subtle and performance-conscious (use `will-change` sparingly)
- All components should be self-contained with their data (no external data fetching needed)
- Follow existing color scheme: zinc-900 background, amber/purple accents

## Current Status
See `docs/state-of-the-union.md` for current audit and priorities.
</parameter>
</result>

I have completed the warmup exploration of this codebase. Here is a summary of the project:

## Codebase Overview

**Project**: Personal portfolio website for David Fotescu, a Software Architect and AI/ML Solutions Architect.

**Tech Stack**:
- Next.js 15 with React 19
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS v4
- Framer Motion for animations
- Lucide React and Heroicons for icons

**Architecture**:
- Single-page application with section-based navigation
- All components are in `/src/components/`
- Main page (`/src/app/page.tsx`) composes 9 sections: Header, HeroSection, Experience, Skills, Projects, PassionProjects, EducationCertifications, Contact, and Footer
- Dark theme with zinc/neutral palette and amber/purple accents
- Functional components with TypeScript
- Self-contained components with inline data (no external fetching)

**Key Files**:
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/app/page.tsx` - Main page composition
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/app/layout.tsx` - Root layout with metadata
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/CLAUDE.md` - Developer guide
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/docs/` - Documentation directory

**Current State**:
- On branch `content-feat`
- Main branch is `main`
- Recent work focused on design refinements (section delineation, layout cleanup, alternating backgrounds)

Ready for any planning or exploration tasks you need.
